notes: Shop - In game assets made available for purchase.
Shop - Token Swapping Supported by 0x Swap API.
Misc - Various fixes and improvements.
Gameplay - New demo mode added. Allows the user to play without connecting a wallet.
Gameplay - Refined token selection modal. Not sure if I love it just yet, but this is good.
Gameplay - Improved how damage and healing is displayed when hovering over an ability during battle.
Gameplay - The words 'Your Turn' now appear when it's your turn to play.
Gameplay - Removed the room identifier from the URL to avoid 404 refresh issues.
Gameplay - New level backdrop: Macaron Atmosphere!
Gameplay - New level backdrop: Space Colosseum!
Gameplay - New level backdrop: Moth Monument!
Gameplay - New level backdrop: Macaron Arctic!
Collection - Minor visual adjustments and improvements.
Gameplay - UI Fixes and Minor Adjustments.
Gameplay - UI Fixes and Minor Adjustments.
Gameplay - Music and Sound FX player fixes.
Gameplay - Single Player Mode Improvements.
Gameplay - Background Effect Improvements.
Gameplay - Single Player Mode Added.
Colyseus - Various Gameplay Logic Improvements.
Gameplay - Auto play music when starting a new battle.
Collections - View your collection of gladiators in a new panel.
Collections - If you don't have any Muffins or Moths, an OpenSea link will be displayed in the collection screen.
Game Analytics Setup
Gameplay - Death animation.
User Interface - Minor adjustments and fixes.
Gameplay - Minor bug fixes and adjustments.
Lobby - Join button fixes.
Settings - Panel will auto close if you click outside of it.
Leaderboard - New View! Leaderboard now shows the top 3 players.
User Interface - Minor adjustments and fixes.
Gameplay Music - Music player fixes and adjustments.
Gameplay Music - Four new music tracks added.
Gameplay Sound FX - Updated sound effects for all abilities.
Optimization - Music and Sound FX now load on demand from a CDN
Gameplay - New Background Added: Planet Macaron Snow
Gameplay - New Background Added: Sacred Moth Starship Palace
Gameplay - Sound effect added for Crumble Cure ability.
Gameplay - Sound effect added for Stardust Revive ability.
Gameplay - Sound effect added for Nebula Pulse ability.
Gameplay - Sound effect added for Hyperdrive Flare ability.
Gameplay - Schema Updates.
Gameplay - Colyseus Framework Syncing Improvements.
Gameplay - New Sacred Moth Ability: Nebula Pulse.
Gladiator - UI Adjustments and Fixes.
Gameplay - Colyseus Framework Integration.
Gameplay - Hyperdrive Flare and Butter Blast Ability FX improvements.
Gladiator - Minor Bug Fixes.
Gameplay - Turn timer increased to 30 seconds.
Gameplay - Battle FX fixes when playing with multiple collections.
Game - Deployment Fixes, Tweaks, and Adjustments.
Sound - Music volume control fixes.
Settings - Autosave added.
Release Notes - Modal added.
Gladiator goes online!
